title: honour
body: hello. how to know when i level up whith honour? why riot didnt made such thing than u would know your honour xp?

replies.body: You get some honor experience after playing games when you are not getting reports. You get some extra by being honored by your teammates as well! Initially, we don't have any kind of experience bar to see how close you are to the next Honor Rank because we didn't want it to necessarily feel like a grind.
Then why not create a progress barr without numbers?
